info.title: Contact Tracing Application API Docs
info.description: API Documentation for the Contact Tracing Application

post.description: In order to use the application, a person needs to pre-register first and will be asessed and verified by admins if that person is eligible to use the application.

file.description: A picture that proves the existence of the person. The primary reference for verifying persons using the application.

put.description: Updates pre-registered Individuals' data. Mostly used whenever admins find out minor errors such as spelling.

delete.description: Deletes a specific pre-registered Individual. This means that this pre-registered Individual is not eligible to use the applciation

get.description: Retrieve pre-registered Individual's image for verification

post.description: In order to use the application, an establishment needs to pre-register first and will be asessed and verified by admins if that establishment is eligible to use the application.

file.description: A picture that proves the existence of the establishment. The primary reference for verifying establishments using the application.

example.message: East Coast Library is now Pre-registered.

put.description: Updates pre-registered Establishments' data. Mostly used whenever admins find out minor errors such as spelling.

delete.description: Deletes a specific pre-registered Establisment. This means that this pre-registered Establisment is not eligible to use the applciation

get.description: Retrieve pre-registered Establishment's image for verification

post.description: Verifies a pre-registered Individual. This means the pre-registered Individual is now eligible to use the application.
Verifies a pre-registered Establishment. This means the pre-registered Establishment is now eligible to use the application.

get.description: Retrieves all Establishments registered in the application. (Responses are limited due to privacy issues)
Retrieves all Individuals registered in the application. (Responses are limited due to privacy issues)

post.description: Creates special Establishments which are rooms.

example.message: College of Engineering & Technology (Room-214) added as a room in College of Engineering & Technology

post.description: Adds a teacher to a School Establishment.

example.message: Person has been added as teacher in College of Engineering & Technology

post.description: Adds an Individual Transaction within an Establishment.
Adds an Individual Transaction within a School Establishment through a special Individual (Teacher).

parameters.name: individualId
parameters.description: Individual ID (Must be a registered Teacher in the passed School Establishment)

put.description: Updates a Transaction by adding a logout field.
Updates a Transaction by adding a logout field through a special Individual (Teacher).

parameters.name: individualId
parameters.description: Individual ID (Must be a registered Teacher in the passed School Establishment)

put.description: Tags an Individual as 'positive' for the virus. This would also tag Individuals which might have been in contact with the infected Individual for the last 15 days.
